channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Enormous pothole, 27th June
item.description:
Large section of an enormous pothole, which is now quite deep and very dangerous. I have met somebody coming the wrong side of the road several times recently because they are trying to avoid this monstrosity. Fix it please before there’s an accident
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 111, Charlton Lane, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes/ worn road, 27th June
item.description:
Very bad condition road along Malvern road by school and swimming baths. Potholes and badly worn surface. Awful to drive along even at low speed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Malvern Road, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Evelyn Close (off Greatfield drive) invaded by wild bramble., 27th June
item.description:
Shrubs and hedges in Evelyn Close; Charlton Kings are being increasingly invaded by wild bramble, causing a threat to pedestrians.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-4, Evelyn Close, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Brambles over pavement, Shakespeare Road near PE way, 26th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 91, Shakespeare Road, St Mark's, Cheltenham

item.title: Litter/tyres, 26th June
item.description:
If I had a £1 for every old tyre casing on the network as I travelled from Cribbs Causeway nr Bristol up to junction 36 of the M6 I'd be rich. There are loads! General rubbish in some areas also poor
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Tewkesbury

item.title: M5 southbound 85.5, 25th June
item.description:
Middle lane around 85.5, large pot hole/ surface damage, difficult to avoid. Been like it for a few weeks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road signs covered by trees, 25th June
item.description:
On approach to the mini roundabout heading towards the mini roundabout both the first signs( shown in picture how it should be) is covered by tree branches and the mini roundabout sign just before the roundabout is also blocked on approach by tree branches and the sign directly opposite the roundabout making it impossible to see. They all need to be cut back to show what direction is needed on approach as these have been like it for a long while so can't tell what direction is needed to go certain ways.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: M5 between 66.5 and 67.1 south bristol direction, 23rd June
item.description:
Very large potholes 3 of them . They are very big and have over 1 year and become worst and worst . I'm hgv driver and when I pass with my lorries overthere the steering wheel jump from my hands . This is very dangerous
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Ashchurch Rural, Tewkesbury

item.title: Patches of massive potholes, 23rd June
item.description:
Both here and a bit further up by the new Bromford development there are two patches of the road that are undriveable. You have to slow right down as they are so rough and bumpy filled with potholes
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayden Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A huge pot hole as you enter the junction, 22nd June
item.description:
There’s a huge pothole as you turn into the junction from PE way. My front wheel banged into it making a horrendous noise!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Grevil Road, Arle, Cheltenham
